## run variable

Main user function. Takes a string w/ DSL source code and optional env and stack. Prepares env using `ensureEnv`<!-- -->, parses, compiles and executes source, then returns resulting [StackContext](./pointfree.stackcontext.md) tuple.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
run: (src: string, env?: any, stack?: pf.Stack) => pf.StackContext
```
